REVIEW.Name: Staff
REVIEW.RHighlight: Aside from the great facilities and comforts and service that this villa provides, Seseh village is also a beautiful place to explore. A stay here provides a very comfortable insight into the traditions of the real Bali.
REVIEW.ROverallComments:
We had a great stay in Seseh Beach Villa II and found everything to be nigh on perfect with all the modern comforts of home mixed with all the lazy pleasures of a tropical holiday. It was incredibly peaceful and quiet with lots of sunshine and swimming by day, while by night we enjoyed big-screen movie sessions, long leisurely dinners and the sounds of the waves lulling us to sleep in our super-soft beds.
After spending much of the day beside the pool, sunset proved to be the best time to head down to the beach for a wander along the sands and a paddle in the surf. There are no lifeguards here and the water can be a bit rough, so swimming is not recommended.
In the evenings, it was fun to gather around our own private bar for a pre-dinner drink. The chef here is a very talented man, and the Balinese and Indonesian specialties that came out of his kitchen were superb. Getting out of our incredibly comfortable bed in the morning was made easy in the knowledge that a hearty breakfast would soon be on the table.
REVIEW.RUnpleasantSurprise: While Seseh Beach Villa II is lovely in its own right, with a beautiful design and all creature comforts and top class staff and facilities, it is really at its best when rented in conjunction with its beachfront sister villa so that guests can truly appreciate the sea views and absolute proximity to the ocean. That said, itâ€™s still only 100 metres from the waves.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have a wonderful stay at Seseh Beach Villas! The staff are amazing, very friendly, helpful and attentive. The villas are beautiful too, well maintained and clean. Thank you Seseh's wonderful staff for taking care of us and helping us create a beautiful wedding here.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To all wonderful staff at Seseh. You made us all feel so welcome and granted our every wish. Thank you for making our holiday truly memorable.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Christmas and New Year with whole family in beautiful, warm and nice Bali. Wonderful staff, nice stay and very good service. We really enjoyed and send you very warm thanks for everything. And Happy New Year without any volcano eruptions.

REVIEW.Name: TA Vilondo
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Time spent in the villa was heavenly. The staff was helpful and friendly. Thanks for everything in Bali. Sure to visit again.
